alert.note: Alert for Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 9:27PM CDT until March 24 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HENDERSON...NORTHEASTERN MCNAIRY...NORTHERN HARDIN...EAST CENTRAL CHESTER AND DECATUR COUNTIES... At 927 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Natchez Trace State Park to Decaturville to 6 miles southeast of Sardis, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Adamsville, Decaturville, Sardis, Reagan, Morris Chapel, Olive Hill, Darden, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Saltillo, Milledgeville, Enville, Rock Hill, Pleasant Grove, Cerro Gordo and Thurman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
